title: Pot Vape Pens, The Crack Cocaine Of Marijuana
teaser: Vape pens are the e-cigarettes of the pot world. But marijuana concentrate, which users load into the vape pen, is dangerously potent. (This story originally aired on April 18, 2014.)
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
